sentences.en: ...the amount of fat and glandular tissue in the breasts.
sentences.cn: ...乳房里的脂肪和腺体组织含量。

sentences.en: A benign epithelial tumor having a glandular origin and structure.
sentences.cn: 良性的上皮肿瘤形成员员的一块.

sentences.en: A bigger worry are memory - boosting supplements that contain raw cow brains and glandular concentrates.
sentences.cn: 更大的忧虑是含有生牛脑和腺体浓缩物增强记忆力的补养品.

sentences.en: A previous Pap smear with an unexplained glandular abnormality.
sentences.cn: 前次巴氏涂片有不能解释的腺体细胞不正常.

sentences.en: At higher magnification , the enlarged prostate has glandular hyperplasia.
sentences.cn: 增生前列腺的腺体增生.

sentences.en: Causing telangiectasia, permeability, smooth muscle spasm, glandular secretion and so on.
sentences.cn: 从而引起毛细血管扩张 、 通透性增加 、 平滑肌痉挛 、 腺体分泌增加等.

sentences.en: Cayce correlated these centers with the endocrine glandular system in the body.
sentences.cn: 凯西将这些中心与身上的腺体系统相联系.

sentences.en: Genius itself, It'seems to me, is but an over - supply of glandular secretions.
sentences.cn: 据我看来,天才仅是腺分泌的供给过多的结果.

sentences.en: I had glandular fever and spent that year feeling rotten.
sentences.cn: 我得了腺热，那一整年都不舒服。

sentences.en: Inflammation may cause damage, so the glandular organization will only cause pain.
sentences.cn: 炎症会造成腺体组织受到伤害, 所以才会引发胀痛.

sentences.en: Presence of atypical glandular cells on Papanicolaou smear.
sentences.cn: 涂片发现有非典型腺细胞者.

sentences.en: South American herb with sticky glandular foliage; source of madia oil.
sentences.cn: 叶子上有腺体的南美草本植物; 可制麻迪菊油.

sentences.en: The anther is tetrasporangiate and glandular tapetum.
sentences.cn: 雄蕊花药四室,腺质绒毡层.

sentences.en: The clitellum is the glandular portion of the epidermis.
sentences.cn: 生殖带是表皮的腺体部分.

sentences.en: The effect of glandular trichomes may depend on the nature of the exudate.
sentences.cn: 具腺毛状体的影响依赖于分泌物的性质.

sentences.en: The purely mechanical effect of glandular trichome exudates is the entrapment and immobilization of small arthropods.
sentences.cn: 具腺毛状体分泌物的纯机械作用是诱捕和粘住小的昆虫.

trans.tran_cn: 腺（状）的，起腺体功能的，有腺的
trans.tran_en: related to the glands, or produced by the glands
